text: Tina Snow is the second extended play (EP) by American rapper Megan Thee Stallion. It was released on June 11, 2018, by 1501 Certified Entertainment and 300 Entertainment. It features the single "Big Ole Freak", her first entry on the US Billboard Hot 100. The alter ego "Tina Snow" was inspired by Pimp C's alter ego "Tony Snow". ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| US Billboard 200 | 166 |} ==References== Category:2018 EPs Category:Megan Thee Stallion EPs
title: Tina Snow
